Html:
Currently as of right now Aggression  under Combat with Rawr is set at the 25 point requirement but in World of Warcraft its at the 20 points requirement.   So it should be moved up a row in Rawr.


Tiptoejoe

Rawr's talent calculators are automatically built off of the WoW website's calculators. When they're fixed, Rawr's will be fixed automatically. We could manually update it, but since there's no updated Rogue model, it's not worth the time right now.
